# uptime_statuspage_status_history (Data Source)

Retrieve status history entries for a status page.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Use with a status page resource
resource "uptime_statuspage" "main" {
  name = "Service Status"
}

# Retrieve status history for a status page
data "uptime_statuspage_status_history" "main" {
  statuspage_id = uptime_statuspage.main.id
}

# Output status history
output "status_history" {
  value       = data.uptime_statuspage_status_history.main
  description = "Historical status data for the status page"
}

output "history_entries" {
  value       = data.uptime_statuspage_status_history.main.history
  description = "List of historical status entries"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `statuspage_id` (Number) ID of the status page to retrieve status history for

### Optional

- `component_id` (Number) Filter by component ID
- `date_from` (String) Filter entries from this date (ISO 8601 format)
- `date_to` (String) Filter entries until this date (ISO 8601 format)
- `status` (String) Filter by status

### Read-Only

- `history` (Attributes List) List of status history entries (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--history))
- `id` (String) Placeholder identifier for the data source

<a id="nestedatt--history"></a>
### Nested Schema for `history`

Read-Only:

- `component_id` (Number) Associated component ID (if applicable)
- `created_at` (String) When this status was created
- `description` (String) Status description
- `id` (Number) History entry ID
- `status` (String) Status value
- `updated_at` (String) When this status was last updated
